TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ColorBuilder extends System.Object

summary.span: 在設計階段提供 HTML 色彩字串產生器，允許使用者選取色彩。

span.span: Provides an HTML color string builder at design time that allows a user to select a color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會啟動使用者介面，讓選取的色彩值。The method starts a user interface for selecting a color value. 類別並不適用於在設計階段環境外部使用。The class is not intended for use outside of the design time environment. 需要，這是在設計階段通常會顯示在 Web Form 專案內。 requires the , which is typically available within a Web Forms project at design time. 如果您想要建立 HTML 色彩字串時，您可能想要實作的方法，將轉換的 RGB 值與 HTML 相容 RRGGBB 格式字串的物件。If you want to build HTML color strings, you may want to implement a method that converts the RGB values of a object to an HTML-compatible RRGGBB format string. 如果您想要使用控制項來選取色彩，或設定色彩，您可以為此，建置使用者介面或您可能想要控制項可讓您編輯預設值的屬性提供色彩選取範圍介面。If you intend to use a control to select a color or configure a color, you can build a user interface for this, or you may want to use a control which allows you to edit properties with the default providing a color selection interface. ## Examples [!code-cpp[ColorBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ColorBuilderExample/CPP/colorbuilderdesigner.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ColorBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ColorBuilderExample/CS/colorbuilderdesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ColorBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ColorBuilderExample/VB/colorbuilderdesigner.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[ColorBuilderExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ColorBuilderExample/CPP/colorbuilderdesigner.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ColorBuilderExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ColorBuilderExample/CS/colorbuilderdesigner.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ColorBuilderExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ColorBuilderExample/VB/colorbuilderdesigner.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static string BuildColor (System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, System.Windows.Forms.Control owner, string initialColor);
.method public static hidebysig string BuildColor(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, class System.Windows.Forms.Control owner, string initialColor) cil managed
Public Shared Function BuildColor (component As IComponent, owner As Control, initialColor As String) As String
public: static System::String ^ BuildColor(System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ component, System::Windows::Forms::Control ^ owner, System::String ^ initialColor);
static member BuildColor : System.ComponentModel.IComponent * System.Windows.Forms.Control * string -> string

param.name: component
param.span: 的站台是用來存取設計階段服務。

span.span: The whose site is to be used to access design-time services.
The used to parent the picker window.

param.name: initialColor
param.span: 要以有效的 HTML 格式在選擇器視窗中顯示的初始色彩。

span.span: The initial color to be shown in the picker window, in a valid HTML color format.

summary.span: 啟動色彩編輯器以建置一個 HTML 色彩屬性值。

span.span: Starts a color editor to build an HTML color property value.

returns.span: 以 HTML 色彩格式字串表示的色彩值，或當無法使用產生器服務時的 。

span.span: The color value, represented as a string in an HTML color format, or if the builder service could not be retrieved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的字串，如果有其他比`null`，指出有效的 HTML 色彩格式的色彩。The returned string, if other than `null`, indicates a color in a valid HTML color format. 有效的格式包括具名的色彩和色彩編碼，格式為 RGB (#RRGGBB)。Valid formats include named colors and color codes in RGB format (#RRGGBB). ## Examples [!code-cpp[ColorBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ColorBuilderExample/CPP/colorbuilderdesigner.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ColorBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ColorBuilderExample/CS/colorbuilderdesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ColorBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ColorBuilderExample/VB/colorbuilderdesigner.vb#1)]
